definitions.text: freedom from doubt; belief in yourself and your abilities
examples: his assurance in his superiority did not make him popular
after that failure he lost his confidence

definitions.text: a binding commitment to do or give or refrain from something
examples: an assurance of help when needed
signed a pledge never to reveal the secret

definitions.text: a statement intended to inspire confidence
examples: the President's assurances were not respected

definitions.text: a British term for some kinds of insurance
